info.name: Dark NationStates Results
info.description: This Styles makes the Results site by Milo, known on NationStates as Milostein and Trotterdam, easier to read and make sense of.
info.additionalInfo: 2019-04-24: Added Roboto and Roboto Mono as fonts. The results show as monospace, to allow for easier identification of results greater than +/- n.nnnn
